name: Google Developers Roadshow - Amman [Sep 19th, Must Apply to attend]

venue.name: Zain Jordan HQ offices, building A

description:
Please join us at the Google Technology event! a Free event & Food (& surprises)!

This will be hosted by Google with multiple Google Developers Experts, and the Google Developers Relations and Ecosystem MENA Region lead attending.

Seating is limited, so Apply ASAP: 

https://goo.gl/edraur

.  

Agenda and Speakers (Android and Web Tracks): https://goo.gl/9rBgMi 

 A confirmation email will be send before Sep 16th by Google Team to those who applies and are accepted. Meetup RSVP does not count as registration for this event

Location: Amman, Jordan on Sep 19 at   Zain Jordan HQ Offices Building A

 The Google Developers Roadshow MENA 2017 is a series of interactive conferences, providing the latest updates on Google technologies and open platforms for developers and industry leaders. It will be held throughout the year at various cities in Middle East and North Africa. We're excited to share our thoughts on innovative technologies and encourage developers to build the next big mobile, web, cloud or machine learning solutions.

Come and join us as we travel around MENA.

name: Google UX Design Thinking for startups - Amman [Nov 15&16]

venue.name: Zain Jordan HQ offices, building A

description:
Good news! This Nov, two leading UX designers from Google will be conducting a 2-day hands-on user experience masterclass for Startups and/or Teams.  This event is ONLY per invite for 8 selected startups, so apply  here  with your teams. individuals cannot attend this particular workshops. 

In recent years, design and user-centered thinking have been embraced by business leaders–not just as a way to do design, but as a wayhttp://www.forbes.com/sites/lawtonursrey/2014/06/04/14-design-thinking-esque-tips-some-approaches-to-problem-solving-work-better-than-others/&refURL=https://www.google.com/&referrer=https://www.google.com/"> to create an effective product development strategyhttp://www.forbes.com/sites/lawtonursrey/2014/06/04/14-design-thinking-esque-tips-some-approaches-to-problem-solving-work-better-than-others/&refURL=https://www.google.com/&referrer=https://www.google.com/"></a>. By attending this class with your cross-functional team, you will learn basic user-centered design processes and how to apply them throughout your entire product development cycle.

We will cover the process of taking product ideas from concept to launch, including sketching, user testing, prototyping, and making continuous improvements after launch to keep your users engaged and satisfied.

Is my startup a good fit?

This class is geared towards startups and companies that would like to improve their product development and shipping process with design thinking, and to establish a more user-centered process. We encourage teams of 4-6 stakeholders representing a wide range of functions (engineers, product managers, designers) to attend. Attendance is limited and it is free to participate, so complete the <a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfp1taTRphpEPnq8wTHLvHPhO1BS1i87sPaPJrGsnlbc_9_Bw/viewform">application form to be considered. Applications will be closed by Oct 22nd.

Please note: If selected, your team will be required to complete a pre-workshop exercise prior to the first day of class.

Topics we'll cover

We plan to cover a wide range of topics over the 2-days with a focus on the following:

the process of taking product ideas from concept to launch, including sketching user testing and prototyping how to drive continuous improvements after launch to keep your users engaged Full agenda available here</a>

Interested? Please apply <a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfp1taTRphpEPnq8wTHLvHPhO1BS1i87sPaPJrGsnlbc_9_Bw/viewform">here

description:
Google I/O extended events are focused on bringing the local developers community together to experience the keynote and other I/O sessions and have discussions around them.

Where?

name: UX Masterclass - Startups ONLY Powered by GDG
description:
Good news! We are running our UXMasterClass 2019 series.

Our Local UX/UI Design Thinking instructors with coordination with the local GDGs & Google DevRel, will be conducting a 2-day hands-on user experience masterclass for early-stage startups in Jordan, focused on Design thinking. This is a free event.

In recent years, design and user-centered thinking have been embraced by business leaders–not just as a way to do design, but as a way to create an effective product development strategy. By attending this class with your cross-functional team, you will learn basic user-centered design processes and how to apply them throughout your entire product development cycle.

We will cover the process of taking product ideas from concept to launch, including sketching, user testing, prototyping, and making continuous improvements after launch to keep your users engaged and satisfied.

Interested? Apply here :
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScIMDD_R7H8s6wxUmbW3uEu5Wp0-jLfC_TuoRSy0zrvHeUKQw/viewform

name: Introduction to User Experience Design
description:
User Experience! Do you know guys about UX design and What it means?

You might have heard that UX is one of the fastest growing and highest paying professions around, best work-life balance and you get to be creative! So what is user experience (UX) design? Why is it so big right now? And How UX design can enhance people’s lives?

Currently, a huge number of people are turning into UX and try to invest in it with almost no experience what the UX industry is like! And that is why we are here!

The good news is, there’s never been a better time to learn about user experience (UX). Whether you are interested in this field, or you just want to learn the principles of UX to create better products, and design better experiences, we’re here to help you get started.

A session about UX will take place next Thursday, March 14th, 2019 as a part of the Scientific Day of the Hijjawi Faculty for Engineering Technology at Yarmouk University. We’ll share what UX is with you.

name: International Woman Day "IWD" GDG Amman 2019

venue.name: ZINC YU (Zain Innovation Campus, Yarmouk University)
venue.address_1: Prince Al Hussein Bin Abdullah II Complex, Yarmouk University, Irbid

description:
GDG Amman and WTM Amman are celebrating The "International Women's Day", 2019 we make our celebration with friends, family, and colleagues. We raise the awareness, celebrate achievements and rally for changes.

So be with us on March 30th, we will feature some of the women making a change in Jordan's entrepreneurial landscape. We will host multiple talks by women and men who will share their adventures to make it a big day for inspiration and change.

Event agenda:
09:00 Doors Open and Registration
09:30 Welcome Remarks and keynote: GDG Amman
09:45 Session: Motivational Talk
10:15 Session: Electronic Crimes Talk
10:45 Tech Session: Strategic Innovation and Value Chain Managment
11:50 GDE Talk
12:20 Lunch and Networking
01:10 Success Stories
01:40 Panel Discussion: Woman and Virtue
02:30 Closing Remarks
03:00 Doors Close

To join us, register on https://t.co/sn8qSurXHN

WTM Website https://www.womentechmakers.com/iwd19

#WTM19 #WomenTechMakers
#WTM19Amman #WTM19MENA #GDGAmman
